name: Open Library
description: Free access to millions of books including ebooks to borrow, with goal to provide one web page for every book ever published
fullDescription: Open Library is a project of the Internet Archive that provides free access to millions of books, with the goal of creating one web page for every book ever published.
whatTheyOffer:
- Millions of free ebooks
- Borrowing system for in-copyright books
- Read online or download
- Multiple formats available
- Community-contributed book data
- Connect with your local library card
howToGetIt:
1. Visit openlibrary.org
2. Create a free account (or use Internet Archive, Google, or library card)
3. Browse or search for books
4. Read online or borrow ebooks
5. Return borrowed books to allow others to read
keywords: Open Library, Internet Archive, free ebooks, borrow books, online library, digital books, book lending, read online
